EmailTemplate.name: Account / Service / Proj Mgrs / BE Inquiries - Enterprise
EmailTemplate.subject: Re: {!Case.Subject} -- Case # {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
As a result of some changes to our Enterprise Support team, effective <<date>>, the following accounts will be supported by << new team >>
<<Customer info>>
This is already communicated to the telecom administrators. .
Please let us know if you have any questions. Have a nice day.
Sincerely,
{!Case.Thread_Id}
